about_the_game:
The Depths of Duskraven Manor is a first-person, turn-based horror RPG where you follow the adventure of five unlikely fugitives that have been summoned to do a job by the most powerful family in the world, the Duskravens. Your party has been dispatched to the old Duskraven manor to quietly take care of a problem they have in the dark depths below. In return, the powerful head of the family, Donovan Duskraven, has promised to have their records wiped, their bank accounts full and a new lease on life.

Little do they know just how deep the dangerous darkness has spread underneath them....

Nolan - A former American intelligence operative who disobeyed one too many orders and has been on the run for years after his former agency determined he has too many secrets in his head to be allowed to live.

Selene - The only confirmed wielder of magic alive among the human race. With every major government and military after her, she's tired of running and ready to hear the Duskravens out, in spite of her late mother's mysterious past with the illustrious family.

Yulia - An orphan raised by a Russian spy agency to be the perfect asset. After years of cruel training and heartless missions, she has gone dark from the watchful eye of her handlers and is ready to live a simple life.

Stan - A genius computer engineer who created what he thought was a simple data crawler AI, only to have it grow beyond his control and nearly destroy the entire world network. In a desperate bid to stop it, he gave his creation what it always wanted, a body. Now residing in an advanced chip fused to his brain stem, Stan hopes the Duskravens can free him from the AI, and the AI hopes they can give it a more durable, capable body.

Bryce - A dark web conspiracy theorist whose desire for the truth has made him many powerful enemies. Imagine his surprise when his most powerful enemy of all reached out with a deal he couldn't resist. In exchange for his assistance, the Duskravens have agreed to give him access to all their secrets, and safety from his many other enemies.

Your intrepid party will brave the depths of the manor, into increasingly labrynthine floors with ever greater horrors awaiting them every step of the way.

With tile-based movement and a first-person 3D view inspired by many cRPGs of the past, The Depths of Duskraven Manor will see you face off against over 60 different enemies and Bosses, including optional boss fights and exploration that will reward you with secret areas and powerful items to aid you as further delve into the horrors below, along with a compelling story that will reveal all the secrets about the manor, the Duskraven family, your party and perhaps all of existence itself!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains disturbing images, frightening scenes and dialogue depicting sexual situations, along with mild nudity in the form of statues and artwork within the game.

short_description: Follow the exploits of five fugitives as they fight their way through the horrors that lurk under Duskraven Manor. With the promises of a clean slate, wealth and freedom from the pasts that haunt them, they fight through unimaginable terror while uncovering a reality-shattering mystery.
